description: Palazzolo's gelatos and sorbettos are made from 100% fresh all natural uncompromised ingredients. Visit our truck and choose from over 50 flavors on board!To learn what inspired Michiganders Chris and Donna Morgan to get into the food truck business, and how they come up with their great flavors, check out the Roaming Hunger blog here: http://roaminghunger.com/blog/5439/palazzolos-artisan-gelato-sorbetto
name: Palazzolo's
